summary: Once again Hannah is plummeted into a murder mystery by finding the dead body of her competitor. But this time she's the one accused of murder over peach cobbler.
cast: Alison Sweeney|Cameron Mathison|Barbara Niven|Lisa Durupt|Gabriel Hogan|Juliana Wimbles|Toby Levins|Roark Critchlow|Michelle Harrison|Garry Chalk|Anne Marie DeLuise|Marion Eisman|Rebecca Toolan|Ty Olsson|Jillian Fargey|Candice-May Davies|Julie Lynn Mortensen|Clare Filipow|Sian Sladen|Michael Meneer
title: A Peach Cobbler Mystery
